subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The Ravens have spent the last two weeks honing instincts and concocting strategy, but they face a challenge trying to stop the 49ers’ inventive offense, the Pistol, in the Super Bowl.
snippet: The Ravens have spent the last two weeks honing instincts and concocting strategy, but they face a challenge trying to stop the 49ers’ inventive offense, the Pistol, in the Super Bowl.
